nodes.text: A senatorial convoy from the Alderaanian fleet commanded by House of Organa Princess Leia Organa was active during the Galactic Civil War. It was dispatched to the planet Lothal to provide reinforcements to the Phoenix Cell rebel group. The convoy was composed of the three Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvettes P1, P2, and P3. After the mission on Lothal, all three corvettes became part of the fleet of the Phoenix Cell.
